posts.post_content:
Hi T206 family,

I'm trying to defeat the monster again. This is like the 6th time I'm trying. He had me down to about 4 cards. I put on new armor, got a bigger sword and now I will try again. Right now I'm looking for raw low grade t206 cards in the $8.00 to $15.00 dollar range. If you have any please let me know. Email me pics. Thanks 

Joe.

Hi Joe, check out my lot of 8 up for auction here on Net54, ending on Sunday.  I think they tick all your lower condition boxes and your budget too.

Brian
Thanks Brian, I will check it out.
